dc.title: OCC - Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, Administrator of National Banks
dc.description: Headed by Comptroller of the Currency John C. Dugan, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) charters, regulates, supervises all national banks, and also supervises the federal branches and agencies of foreign banks.
